CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_custom
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = ';', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2   )
);
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'sample01_storageazuredemo2023_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [sample01_storageazuredemo2023_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://sample01@storageazuredemo2023.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.sample_csv (
	[c1] nvarchar(4000),
	[c2] nvarchar(4000),
    [c3] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'abc/datafiles/abc.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [sample01_storageazuredemo2023_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = csv_custom
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.sample_csv
GO
